      • trunc

        public static java.util.Date trunc(java.util.Date date)
        Truncs a date by setting hh:mm:ss to 00:00:00. For example for date "12/02/2012 13:24:34" returns "12/02/2012 00:00:00.000" It is useful for comparing dates in the same day.
        Parameters:
        date -
        Returns:
